augments.desc: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble gains +@MaxRange@ Range and constantly fires missiles at enemies, increased with Attack Speed.
augments.name: Artillery Barrage

augments.desc: Arcanists gain @ManaRegen@ Mana Regen. After every @ManaToSpend@ Mana they spend, a magical effect hits the board. Gain a Lulu and a Kog'Maw.
augments.name: Chaos Magic

augments.desc: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain @Gold@ gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.
augments.name: Bandle Bounty I

augments.desc: Get a Slayer Emblem, a Yasuo, and a Quicksilver.
augments.name: Slayer Crown

augments.desc: Get an Ionia Emblem, a Yasuo, and a Deathblade.
augments.name: Ionia Crown

augments.desc: Gain the Darkin Scythe, a powerful Artifact for Attack Fighters that grants the Darkin trait. Darkin heal the Tactician with takedowns.
augments.name: The Darkin Scythe

augments.desc: Get a Bilgewater Emblem, a Twisted Fate, and a Guinsoo's Rageblade.
augments.name: Bilgewater Crown

augments.desc: Your Targonians gain @MaxHealth@ max Health and @ADAP@% Attack Damage and Ability Power for every Targonian fielded. Gain an Aphelios.
augments.name: Climb the Mountain

augments.desc: Get a Defender Emblem, a Garen, and a Chain Vest.
augments.name: Defender Circlet

augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Darkin Weapons. Darkin Weapons are Artifacts that grant the Darkin trait.
augments.name: Unsealed From Steel

augments.desc: Get a Zaun Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and...a 2-Star Vi!?
augments.name: Zaun Circlet

augments.desc: The first @NumChampions@ champions that die each combat spawn copies of your strongest champion. Copies have @ReducedHealth*100@% max Health and deal @ReducedDamage*100@% damage.
augments.name: Guile

augments.desc:
Slayers gain @BaseDA*100@% Damage Amp, plus @DAPerBreakpoint*100@% for every @SurvivingSlayerBreakpoint@ surviving Slayers at the end of combat. Gain a Briar and a Qiyana.

Current Damage Amp: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_Augment_Slayer_TotalDomination_CurrentDA@%
augments.name: Total Domination+

augments.desc: Gain a Time Undilator, a dangerous bomb that destroys ALL units in an X-pattern at the start of combat. Also, something is terribly wrong with your shop...
augments.name: Time UNdilator

augments.desc: Get a Void Emblem, a Bel'veth, and a Recurve Bow.
augments.name: Void Circlet

augments.desc: 3-star Yordles become massive, moving slower but gaining @Health*100@% Health and @ADAP@% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.
augments.name: Wild Growth

augments.desc: Get a 2* Sona , a Lich Bane, and a Tear Of The Goddess
augments.name: Artifact Expert: Lich Bane

augments.desc: Your team gains @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp, increased to @EnhancedDamageAmp*100@% if the Noxus trait is active.
augments.name: Darkwill's Invasion

augments.desc: Get an Ixtal Emblem.
augments.name: Ixtal Crest

augments.desc: Gain a Spatula. Champions holding Spatula or Frying Pan items gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and @ManaRegen@ Mana Regen.

augments.desc: After you unlock @ChampsToEmblem@ champions from an origin, gain that origin's Emblem.
augments.name: Complete Collection

augments.desc: Get a 2* Caitlyn , a Luden's Tempest, and a Recurve Bow
augments.name: Artifact Expert: Luden's Tempest

augments.desc: Gain a Singed and a 2-star Teemo. Every @FireInterval@ seconds, Teemo fires a Toxic Dart at Singed's target. When an enemy poisoned by Teemo dies, Singed gains Ability Power for the rest of combat.
augments.name: Poison Pals

augments.desc: Gain @LesserDuplicatorAmount@ Lesser Champion Duplicators, a Shen, a Jhin, and @Gold@ gold. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.
augments.name: Walk The True Path I

augments.desc: Get a Demacia Emblem, a Garen, and a Needlessly Large Rod.
augments.name: Demacia Circlet

augments.desc: Get a Warden Emblem, a Xin Zhao, and an Adaptive Helm.
augments.name: Warden Crown

augments.desc: Get a Defender Emblem, a Neeko, and a Steadfast Heart.
augments.name: Defender Crown

augments.desc:
Every takedown Atakhan scores permanently grants him @AP@% Ability Power and @MaxHealth@ max Health. Gain a Briar and a Sion.
(Current Takedowns: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_Augment_Noxus_BringerOfRuin_Takedowns@)

augments.desc: Gain a Cho'Gath. Your strongest Cho'Gath gains +1 Attack Range and his attacks launch spikes that deal magic damage based on his max Health.

augments.desc: Gain the Darkin Aegis, a powerful Artifact for Tanks that grants the Darkin trait. Darkin heal the Tactician with takedowns.

augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Viego. Your strongest Viego shares @PassiveSharePercent*100@% of his Passive with other Shadow Isles allies. After collecting @SoulReq@ souls, his Ability upgrades.

augments.desc: Gain a Yasuo and Rek'Sai. Each time your spinning champions spend @ManaToSpend@ total Mana they permanently gain @Health@ Health and @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp. Fielding more increases their spin area by 1-hex.
augments.name: Spin to Win

augments.desc: Get a Longshot Emblem.

augments.desc: Get a Freljord Emblem.

augments.desc: Gain an Earth Hex. Champions within gain @Resistances@ Armor and Magic Resist. At @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they Stun enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes for @StunDuration@ seconds.

augments.desc: Longshots gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. If they cast while their target is within @HexDistanceFromTarget@ hexes, the target is knocked back @KnockbackDistanceInHexes@ hexes (cooldown: @CooldownDuration@s). Gain a Caitlyn and a Kog'Maw.
augments.name: Keep Away

augments.desc: Gain a Xin Zhao. Your strongest Xin Zhao constantly strikes nearby enemies and executes enemies. After @RoundsBeforeTransformation@ player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. He replaces Xin Zhao and takes his items.

For every @NumTakedownsReq@ enemies that Mutated Void allies takedown, gain @XP@ XP. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Cho'Gath. (Takedowns: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_Augment_Void_EvolveAndOvercome_Takedowns@/@NumTakedownsReq@)

Void provides unique Mutations.
augments.name: Evolve and Overcome

augments.desc: Demacians gain @Health@ permanent Health every time they rally. They also gain @Stats@% permanent Attack Damage and Ability Power every @RallyCount@ rallies. Gain a Jarvan IV, a Sona, and a Xin Zhao.

Collecting all 3 Tenet augments grants a powerful reward.

At the start of each round, if the combined health of all your unique Bruisers is high enough, gain a reward and increase the threshold (up to four times). Gain an Shen and a Sion.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT16_Augment_Weightlifting_RewardName@@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT16_Augment_Weightlifting_CurrentHealth@ / @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT16_Augment_Weightlifting_MaxHealth@
